  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:b6017e51b22916c5250c132e1b33b85d1277c276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>b6017e51b22916c5250c132e1b33b85d1277c276</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Kevadlilled</string>
            <string language="en">Spring flowers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling Blumen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleurs de ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flores da mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiori della molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λουλούδια άνοιξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flores del resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">MS PowerPoint esitlus kevadlilledest metsas (sinilill, võsaülane, kollane ülane, paiseleht, varsakabi, nurmenukk, kullerkupp, jaanilill, võilill, maikelluke) ja aias (lumikelluke, märtsikelluke, krookus, siniliilia, tulp, nartsiss, margareta). Esitlusele on lisatud lillebingo mäng, mida saab esitluse vaatamise ajal mängida. Bingokaardid on vaja välja trükkida ja õpilaste vahel ära jagada.</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint presentation about spring flowers in the forest (hepatica, wood anemone, windflower, coltsfoot, marsh marigold, cowslip, globeflower, corn marigold, dandelion, lily of the valley) and in the garden (snowdrop, snowflake, crocus, blue lily, tulip, daffodil). There is a flower bingo game accompanying the presentation that can be played while watching the presentation. You have to print out and hand to students bingo cards.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Taimed</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Darstellung über Frühling blüht im 
Wald (hepatica, hölzerne Anemone, windflower, Coltsfoot, 
Sumpfringelblume, cowslip, globeflower, Maisringelblume, Löwenzahn, 
Lilie der Senke) und im Garten (snowdrop, Schneeflocke, Krokus, blaue 
Lilie, Tulpe, Narzisse). Es gibt ein Blumebingospiel, welches 
die Darstellung begleitet, die beim Überwachen der Darstellung 
gespielt werden kann. Sie müssen und Hand zu den 
Kursteilnehmerbingokarten heraus drucken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation de PowerPoint au sujet du 
ressort fleurit dans la forêt (hepatica, anémone en bois, 
windflower, coltsfoot, souci de marais, cowslip, globeflower, souci de
maïs, pissenlit, lis de la vallée) et dans le jardin (snowdrop, 
flocon de neige, crocus, lis bleu, tulipe, jonquille). Il y a un
jeu de bingo-test de fleur accompagnant la présentation qui peut 
être jouée tout en observant la présentation. Vous devez 
imprimer dehors et main aux cartes de bingo-test d'étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A apresentação de PowerPoint sobre a mola 
flowers na floresta (hepatica, anemone de madeira, windflower, 
coltsfoot, marigold do pântano, cowslip, globeflower, marigold de 
milho, dandelion, lírio do vale) e no jardim (snowdrop, snowflake, 
açafrão, lírio azul, tulip, daffodil). Há um jogo do bingo 
da flor que acompanha a apresentação que pode ser jogada ao prestar 
atenção à apresentação. Você tem que imprimir para fora e 
mão aos cartões do bingo dos estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La presentazione del PowerPoint circa la molla 
fiorisce nella foresta (hepatica, anemone di legno, windflower, 
coltsfoot, tagete della palude, cowslip, globeflower, tagete di 
cereale, dente di leone, giglio della valle) e nel giardino (snowdrop,
fiocco di neve, croco, giglio blu, tulip, daffodil). Ci è un 
gioco di bingo del fiore che accompagna la presentazione che può 
essere giocata mentre guarda la presentazione. Dovete stampare 
fuori e mano alle schedi di bingo degli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint παρουσίαση για τα λουλούδια άνοιξη στο 
δάσος (hepatica, ξύλινο anemone, windflower, coltsfoot, 
marigold έλους, cowslip, globeflower, marigold 
καλαμποκιού, πικραλίδα, κρίνος της κοιλάδας) και στον κήπο 
(snowdrop, snowflake, κρόκος, μπλε κρίνος, τουλίπα, 
daffodil). Υπάρχει ένα παιχνίδι bingo λουλουδιών που 
συνοδεύει την παρουσίαση που μπορεί να παιχτεί προσέχοντας την 
παρουσίαση. Πρέπει να εκτυπώσετε και χέρι στις κάρτες 
bingo σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La presentación de PowerPoint sobre el resorte 
florece en el bosque (hepatica, anémona de madera, windflower, 
coltsfoot, maravilla del pantano, cowslip, globeflower, maravilla de 
maíz, diente de león, lirio del valle) y en el jardín (snowdrop, 
copo de nieve, azafrán, lirio azul, tulipán, narciso). Hay un 
juego del bingo de la flor que acompaña la presentación que puede 
ser jugada mientras que mira la presentación. Usted tiene que 
imprimir hacia fuera y mano a las tarjetas del bingo de los 
estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Natureza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Natura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Naturaleza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plantas</string>
          </keyword>
